metadata.title: CVE-2022-20617 jenkins-2-plugins/docker-commons: does not sanitize the name of an image or a tag which could result in an OS command execution (important)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: An OS command execution vulnerability was found in the Jenkins Docker Commons plugin. Due to a lack of sanitization in the name of an image or a tag, an attacker with Item/Configure permission or the ability to control the contents of a previously configured jobâ€™s SCM repository may be able to execute OS commands.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
